title: How are all simple machines really one machine? - Quora

response.answer_text: The most complex machines are just advanced combinations of the basic 6: LeverWheel and axlePulleyInclined planeWedgeScrewHowever, these are just the mechanical basics. You might notice this does not include forces like pneumatics, hydraulics, electronics, etc. Just the transfer of force by the physical movement of solids.
